annotations: Job Level Experienced with over 2 years experience

Objective Texas based company with national reach is growing and looking for software developers to design develop and maintain proprietary software applications The position requires someone that is quality focused technically curious takes initiative and is interested in a variety of duties to include full life cycle development Candidates should be able to participate in analyzing designing writing and testing code Implement functionally appropriate technically sound and well integrated application systems

Experience 2 5 years experience preferred Knowledge of software development practices computer science theory and relevant technologies Working experience in the following technologies Net C C OTT Python or similar high level language Required SQL Server Preferred XML XSD XSLT Preferred DHTML Preferred VBScript Preferred Understanding and experience with implementing unit testing methodologies Excellent interpersonal skills including verbal and written communication teamwork and customer service Ability to work well both independently and within a team environment Knowledge and proficiency in multiple operating systems
Education BS BA degree in related field or equivalent experience is preferred
Skills Ability to write and test code within mandated deadlines and requirements

Additional Information Responsibilities Participates in analyzing designing writing and testing code Documents and implements functionally appropriate technically sound and well integrated application systems This is completed in accordance with customer requirements and defined organizational methodologies Reviews code from other developers for correctness performance and adherence to company coding policies Produces written test cases for new application development and system enhancements Performs application testing of new application development and enhancements Performs maintenance coding i e bug fixing on existing systems applications Reviews business requirements documentation Produces internal development documentation as needed Provides technical support in order to troubleshoot end user application program problems Performs other job related duties and responsibilities as may be assigned from time to time Vision in developing an IT team to meet growing demands
